Name: Honda Shadow Phantom
Description: This cruiser is perfect for any speedster who wants some comfort. This 745cc V-twin engine will leave anyone in the dust. After our tuneups on this bike it has reached a top speed of 150mph.

Name: Kawasaki Ninja H2
Description: Here is the bike if you want to be the fastest thing allowed on streets. An absolute beast that can reach top speeds of 200 mph.

Name: Yamaha 700f
Description: A supermoto that looks crazy and drives crazier. This thing wheelies without trying and can hit speeds of 130mph.

Name: KTM 450SR
Description: Our favorite supermoto for sale here at speedsters. Everyone will look at you while speeding by in this bike. You could be doing speeds of 150mph.

Name: Honda Metropolitan
Description: Welcome to city speeding in style. This scooter is sleek and we have made it fast. Topping out at 87 mph take this scooter down the highway and impress everyone.

Name: Kawasaki Vulcan 1700
Description: An absolute beast of a cruiser. 1700cc V-Twin with integrated luggage is the perfect cross country cruiser. You will make it there on time with top speeds of 164mph.

Name: Harley Street Glide
Description: The most iconic cruiser body style of all time. You cant go wrong with a street glide. To get across the country, ride this bike at speeds of 156mph.

Name: Honda CB300R
Description: All speedsters have to start somewhere. This is the perfect starting sport bike coming with a good price and good speed. A smooth rider this bike also topped out at 103 mph.

Name: Kawasaki KLX300
Description: This 4-stroke supermoto brings power and speed to the dirt and the road. The perfect starter, it tops out at 85mph.

Name: Suzuki DRZ400
Description: This 400cc supermoto is a bestseller. Strong braking and acceleration, this bike is perfect and will last you a lifetime. Cruise the track or streets at speeds of 130mph.

Name: Harley Ultra Limited
Description: Going for a road trip with passengers and luggage? Start up the Ultra and drive down the highway with luxury comfort. Did we wention it can go 160mph.

Name: Suzuki Burgman 400
Description: The biggest scooter we have for sale here with a liquid cooled 400cc engine. Some may say overkill for a scooter but we say its perfect. It tops out at 93mph.

Name: Honda CRF450RL
Description: When it comes to versatility, no need to look any further. On-road or off this bike will be rippin it up. Six-speed transmission giving you ulitmate control over this bike. We have got this bike to reach top speed of 100mph.

Name: KTM RC 8C
Description: The 8C is ready to race. A star on the track with 99kW of power. Reach top speeds of 178mph with this bike.

Name: Yamaha XMAX 300
Description: A scooter with a 300cc engine. Thats how you go fast and save gas. This scooter can reach speeds of 90 mph.

Name: Suzuki Hayabusa
Description: One of the fastest bikes ever sold, you know we have to sell them here. 1300cc inline four cylinder on a bike. This will make you fly up to 190mph.

Name: Harley Street Bob
Description: Classic laid back Harley. It does not get much better than that. We beefed it up for you so it can reach 140mph.

Name: Yamaha R1
Description: The classic 1000cc sport bike. You can accept any race on the streets with this bike. Reach top speeds of 200mph.
